ygData.subject: RE: RE: Hey this sounded interesting.. *Time to KABOING ??*
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If more likely to happen scenarios are your version of worst-case then so be it. You re assuming that everyone is of the high enough level to group
ygData.messageBody:
> > Bard & Wizard are fighting in lower Guk. Bard is bound in
> > Freeport while Wizard is bound in Innothule right outside
> > the Guk zone line. Bard & Wizard die. Bard runs through 5
> > zones, and does so naked with no weapon.
>
> No, bard sits and memorizes songs, finishes, clicks on "Yes"
> to the resurrection prompt from the group's cleric.
>
> See what I mean about you picking worst-case scenarios?

If "more likely to happen" scenarios are your version of
"worst-case" then so be it. You're assuming that everyone
is of the high enough level to group with a level 29+
cleric. (Assuming such a level cleric is even available)

Again, your point is moot to people that aren't of higher
levels.
